Package Main

Class GameSounds

java.lang.Object
Main.GameSounds
public class GameSounds
extends java.lang.Object
Public class GameSounds is responsible for adding audio to the game such as BGM and sound effects. There are 2 types of audio in the game which are BGM which loop continuously and sound effects which only play once.
Since:
28/11/2021
Version:
1.0
Author:
TanZhunXian

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private javax.sound.sampled.Clip bgm
    The BGM for the current screen.
    private int songID
    The id of the song used to control song change
    private javax.sound.sampled.Clip soundEffect
    The sound effects for actions like collision.
